title: Examining Gender-Lens Investing
itunes:title: Examining Gender-Lens Investing
description:
Suzanne Biegel, Co-Founder of GenderSmart, discusses investing for financial return while also considering the benefits to women.
Hosts: Carol Massar and Mike Regan. Producer: Paul Brennan. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
